    • org.apache.catalina.manager中ContextName的使用

      参数类型为ContextName的org.apache.catalina.manager中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      protected void ManagerServlet.deploy(java.io.PrintWriter writer, ContextName cn, java.lang.String tag, boolean update, HttpServletRequest request, StringManager smClient)
      Deploy a web application archive (included in the current request) at the specified context path.
      protected void ManagerServlet.deploy(java.io.PrintWriter writer, ContextName cn, java.lang.String tag, StringManager smClient)
      Install an application for the specified path from the specified web application archive.
      protected void ManagerServlet.deploy(java.io.PrintWriter writer, java.lang.String config, ContextName cn, java.lang.String war, boolean update, StringManager smClient)
      Install an application for the specified path from the specified web application archive.
      protected java.lang.String HTMLManagerServlet.deployInternal(java.lang.String config, ContextName cn, java.lang.String war, StringManager smClient)
      Deploy an application for the specified path from the specified web application archive.
      protected void HTMLManagerServlet.displaySessionDetailPage(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse resp, ContextName cn, java.lang.String sessionId, StringManager smClient)

      protected void HTMLManagerServlet.doSessions(ContextName cn, HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse resp, StringManager smClient) 
      protected java.lang.String HTMLManagerServlet.expireSessions(ContextName cn, HttpServletRequest req, StringManager smClient)
      Extract the expiration request parameter

      Invalidate HttpSessions

      Display session information and invoke list.

      Session information for the web application at the specified context path.

      已过时。 
      Use ManagerServlet.sessions(PrintWriter, ContextName, int, StringManager)
